about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Time to truly experience America’s busiest commuter railroad in Train Sim World®! Return to Long Island and delve deep into an enhanced New York – Hicksville route, now including the Long Beach branch, new lighting and skies, overhauled signalling, and an all-new bustling timetable making use of key LIRR traction, including the state-of-the-art M9!

We’ve been working closely with the licensor to bring you an immersive, but safe representation of the route. This means there are a few adjustments to the experience, including Safety Systems (ATC, ACSES & Alerter) being always enabled. To learn about the LIRR systems, please refer to the manual to get started.

As one of two important networks owned and operated by the MTA, the Long Island Rail Road stretches east out of the bustling New York metropolis from 2 key terminals; Atlantic and New York Penn. Serving on average a quarter of a million passengers a day, it’s easily North America’s busiest commuter railroad, with many services per hour, and also the USA’s oldest, having been in continuous operation since 1834.

Embark on a variety of passenger services with the LIRR’s all-new M9 equipment, and the staple LIRR M7, from the Big Apple, through the complex Jamaica Station, and out onto the Long Beach and Hempstead lines, as well as the main line to Hicksville. With a new timetable and an extended 57-mile network, this makes for a much more engaging and realistic experience.

The route is as immersive as can be with the new volumetric skies, clouds and fog, as well as snow and rain effects, bringing a new atmosphere to the city that never sleeps. All aboard for New York with Train Sim World®: LIRR Commuter!

While not a requirement, it is recommended to own Train Sim World®: LIRR M3 EMU as it is compatible with LIRR Commuter.

Key Features


  • 57-mile network across the Western end of the Long Island Rail Road including:
    • New York Penn Station, Atlantic City Terminal & Long Island City to Jamaica, then onward along;
    • Long Beach Branch via both Locust Manor and St Albans
    • Main Line to Hicksville
    • Hempstead Branch
    • Belmont Park Branch
  • Improvements to the route include:
    • Overhauled signalling
    • New PIS displays
    • Volumetric skies & lighting
    • Plus more!
  • LIRR M9 & M7 EMUs
  • Highly detailed driving cabs with feature-rich screens and advanced safety systems
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • 6 engaging Scenarios, including one Conductor/Guard scenario, and an authentic Timetable, including a layer for the LIRR M3 EMU
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 8.2 GB
